name: greasily
content:
greasily adverb
(INVOLVING OIL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
covered with or containing a lot of fat or oil: Her hair straggled greasily, and her face was pale. Their diet was terribly, greasily, disgustingly unhealthy. Related word
greasy
More examplesFewer examplesLice scuttled greasily through her hair.High-fat food leers greasily from advertising hoardings and TV screens.The greasily painted performance artists played drums, piano, and pipes.The old man looked up from his roast lamb and grinned greasily at them.
greasily adverb
(UNPLEASANTLY)
in an unpleasant way that makes you feel uncomfortable: The newspaper commented greasily about her sexual status. It is hard to ignore the greasily preachy tone. Synonym
creepily informal
More examplesFewer examplesThe sensation of cold rolled greasily about her.
